nodes.text: The Titavian IV was an exploration ship used by the Intergalactic Zoological Society. It was named after the titavian species of Naboo.
The vessel had holding pens for alien wildlife and was built with several landing bays.

Around 20 BBY it was attacked and its crew killed, possibly by pirates or Separatist privateers. Some time later Quinlan Vos, being hunted by Asajj Ventress and Tol Skorr, found the wreck when he emerged from hyperspace, hiding on it. They followed him, spacing his personal ship and releasing seeker droids against him.

He was rescued when Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi arrived, lured by Vos' old Jedi distress signal. The two defeated the droids and evaded the dark Jedi and the rancor they released, eventually escaping in Vos' fighter after destroying the Separatist ship and returning to the Battle of Rendili.

General Grievous soon arrived to rescue the Dark Jedi, taking Skorr back to Dooku for an accounting while Ventress left for Coruscant, intent on dealing with Vos, but finding Anakin Skywalker instead.
